Name: Legend of Egypt - Jewels of the Gods 2
About the game: A cat-like creature has entered the chambers of the Pharaoh and absorbed his soul. Who is behind this dark magic and will succeed in lifting the curse by building an imposing city? Find out in a challenging match 3 game! Build a magnificent city in ancient Egypt and free Pharaoh from the claws of the creature. Bonuses and power-ups will help you do so. A gripping story, puzzles and mini-games, upgrades, extras and trophies await you! Features: - Sequel to the popular Match 3 game 'Jewel of the Gods - Experience a challenging and exciting Match 3 game - Build a city in ancient Egypt - Win various upgrades, power ups, trophies - Solve exciting puzzle, hidden object and bonus games
